sentence.Network_en: This system is a simulated burglarproof alarm, it has two main modules.
sentence.Network_cn: 本系统只是模拟防盗报警, 主要有两个大的模块.

sentence.Network_en: Grating, shelf, burglarproof doors and windows, snowproofing fence and parking apron.
sentence.Network_cn: 栏栅 、 货架 、 防盗门窗 、 防雪围栏、停车停机坪.

sentence.Network_en: Other auxiliary equipment such as air - conditioner and burglarproof door.
sentence.Network_cn: 以及其他辅助设备,如 空调,防盗门等等.
